BadgeDetail.Name: Written Communication
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they can communicate effectively in written form.They are able to write business communications such as letters and emails using standard conventions with correct use of spelling and grammar. They are able to structure their writing to clearly express their thoughts and can adapt their style appropriately to the target audience.
